Senior House Officer (ICU, NICU Surgery, Medicine)
Job Context
We are looking to employ experienced obstetrician and gynecologist in our hospital located at Uttar Badda Dhaka.
Job Responsibilities
  • Act under the supervision of the Consultant and to support the Consultant in their duties.
  • Admit patients from the Emergency Department.
  • Attend daily ward rounds with the team.
  • Take hand over of patients from previous shift Registrar, so that continuity of care is ensured and immediate decisions are made and orders written.
  • Review patients on a regular basis in accordance with the plan of care made at the beginning of the shift and inform the consultant of any issues or problems.
  • Document review findings in clinical notes in a timely and legible manner.
  • Cover duties as assigned by the Management.
  • Respond to any adverse occurrences e. g. injuries, falls, sudden illnesses etc., suffered by patients, visitors or staff.
  • Contribute to quality improvement; risk management initiatives and policy development so that the overall service is of the highest quality and reflective of best practice.
  • Assist in the education of colleagues and staff.
  • Act and behave professionally and perform one’s duties in a manner that optimizes patient care and protects and enhances the reputation of AMZ Hospital.
  • Adhere to Hospital Policies and Procedures e. g. JCI, Code Blue, infection control, work hours and overtime.
  • Comply with Health and Safety Regulations, ensuring safe working practices in a safe working environment.
  • Undertake any other duties that may be required, which could include assisting medical colleagues throughout the hospital and acting as a resource for more junior colleagues
Educational Requirements
  • MBBS degree from any Government recognized medical college
  • FCPS Part-1 /DA
Experience Requirements 
  • Minimum 3- Years’ experience after MBBS
Additional Job Requirements
  • Shows respect and behave in accordance with Good Medical Practice
  • Works flexibly and deals with tasks effectively and efficiently
  • Remains calm in stressful or high-pressure situations and adopts a timely, rational approach
  • Maintains good inter personal relationship with colleagues and juniors
  • Competence to build and effectively manage interpersonal relationships at all levels of the company.
  • Excellent oral & Written communication skills with strong command in MS Excel & MS Word.
  • Ability to remain, objective and professional in challenging situations.
  • Ability to work in fast paced work environment both independently and in a group.

Job Location
Uttar Badda, Dhaka

Salary
  • Negotiable
  • Attractive remuneration packages are being offered for the deserving candidate.

Email: career@amzhospitalbd.com

Company Information
AMZ Hospital Ltd. Address: 80/3, Shadinota Sarani (Pragati Sarani), North Badda, Dhaka-1212

Senior House Officer/ Sr. Medical Officer (Female) - (Obstetrics & Gynecology)
Job Context
We are looking to employ experienced obstetrician and gynecologist in our hospital located at Uttar Badda Dhaka

Job Responsibilities
  • Performing surgeries (CS & NVD) and gynecological procedures on patients.
  • Performing regular treatment of women during pregnancy and childbirth in indoor and outdoor.
  • Diagnosis and treatment of diseases of female reproductive organs.
  • Treat women’s health such as menopause, hormone problems and infertility.
  • Explaining test results and treatment options to patients.
  • Advising patients on suitable birth control options.
  • A caring and compassionate nature when working with patients and their families.

Educational Requirements
  • MBBS Government Medical College with 1year Training (Gyne &  Obs) will be preferred

Experience Requirements 
  • At least 3 years

Additional Job Requirements
  • Only females are allowed to apply

Job Location
Uttar Badda, Dhaka
Salary
  • Negotiable
  • Attractive remuneration packages are being offered for the deserving candidate.
 

Email: career@amzhospitalbd.com

Company Information
AMZ Hospital Ltd. Address: 80/3, Shadinota Sarani (Pragati Sarani), North Badda, Dhaka-1212

Nursing Supervisor (Female)

Job Responsibilities:

  • Ensure that indoor nurses/paramedics on-duty greet and receive patients with smiling face, counsel patients and their attendants properly, fill-up necessary forms, maintain files, keep data and record in the registers.
  • Provide round for all admitted patients at least twice in a day, discuss with patients and their attendants about doctor’s visit, routine examination of vital signs, timely administration of drugs and diet, bed change and bed making, bowel habits and other related issues based on the disease conditions & any other problems they may face.
  • Communicate with respective consultants, IMO, Coordinator about conditions of the patients and any treatment related complain of the patients or attendants.
  • Prepare roster of indoor nurses and care assistants and monitor its proper implementation.
  • Monitor registers and patient-file for handover of charges, documentation of vital signs, administration of drugs, diagnostic tests, and proper record keeping with name of personnel, date & time.
  • Supervise activities of staff for waste management, infection prevention and cleaning.
  • Ensure release of patients within 30 minutes after receiving discharge certificates.
  • Keep correct data & information of the patients, bed occupancy and prepare daily indoor report.
  • Ensure conduction of NVD following Partograph and communication with respective consultant, duty doctor about its progress.
  • Check that all necessary drugs, instruments and other stuffs are available at indoor and are recorded properly in a register.
  • Monitor and verify process of care of indoor patients from admission up to discharge.
  • Provide data/information to supervisor for preparing report.
  • Inform hospital managers about any emergency situation well ahead of time.
  • Provide on-job training to the indoor nurse and care assistants.
  • Attend periodic meetings and training sessions.
  • Carry out any other relevant activities as and when necessary as per instruction of the Supervisor.

Employment Status:
Full-time

Educational Requirements:

  • Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Nursing Science/ Diploma in Nursing.

Experience Requirements:

  • At least 7 year(s)

Additional Requirements:

  • Age 30 to 40 years
  • Only females are allowed to apply
  • 7 years experience in Ward/Critical Care areas/Specialty (General Wards, HDU, ICU, Accident & Emergency etc.) wise
  • Nursing with minimal team lead experience. Candidate completed course in CPR & in emergency management certification may treated as added advantage.
  • Skills in organizing, directing and supervising of nursing personnel on respective work area.
  • Technical Competencies: Basic Computer Skill. Guiding, teaching and inspiring the nurses on respective work area.
  • Good technical Knowledge and skills on Specialty/area wise medical equipment and machines.
  • Behavioral Competencies: Discipline, Commitment, Team Player, Dynamic
  • Council Registration Requirements: Valid Registration and License from BNC

Job Location: Dhaka

Salary: Negotiable

Email: career@amzhospitalbd.com

Company Information
AMZ Hospital Limited. Address: 80/3, Shadinota Sarani (Pragati Sarani), North Badda, Dhaka-1212

Discover Your Potential

Careers at Administrator Dept.

Executive-(Procurement )
Job Context
AMZ Hospital Ltd is envisions a network of quality, patient-centered one-stop outpatient and Inpatient health centers offering family doctors, including women`s health, outpatient department with visiting specialists, comprehensive diagnostic lab, including advanced imaging, and pharmacy.

Job Responsibilities
  • Estimate and establish cost parameters and budgets for purchases
  • Create and maintain good relationships with vendors/suppliers
  • Make professional decisions in a fast-paced environment
  • Maintain records of purchases, pricing, and other important data
  • Review and analyze all vendors/suppliers, supply, and price options
  • Develop plans for purchasing equipment, services, and supplies
  • Negotiate the best deal for pricing and supply contracts
  • Ensure that the products and supplies are high quality
  • Maintain and update a list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development.
  • Prepare Inventory and Materials Stock Report
  • Work with team members to complete duties as needed

Educational Requirements
  • Graduation or Masters in any discipline of Business administration, accounting, or related field preferred

Experience Requirements 
  • Minimum 2 years’ experience as a procurement officer or related position

Additional Job Requirements
  • Solid knowledge and understanding of procurement processes, policy, and systems
  • Proficient computer skills, including Microsoft Office Suite (Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Excel)
  • Ability to analyze problems and strategize for better solutions
  • Ability to negotiate, establish, and administer contracts
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently
  • Accurate and precise attention to detail
  • Ability to work well with management and staff at all levels
  • Goal-oriented, organized team player

Job Location
Uttar Badda, Dhaka

Salary
  • Negotiable
 

Email: career@amzhospitalbd.com

Company Information
AMZ Hospital Ltd. Address: 80/3, Shadinota Sarani (Pragati Sarani), North Badda, Dhaka-1212

Cash Point Executive/ Billing Executive
Job Context
AMZ Hospital Ltd is envisions a network of quality, patient-centered one-stop outpatient and Inpatient health centers offering family doctors, including women`s health, outpatient department with visiting specialists, comprehensive diagnostic lab, including advanced imaging, and pharmacy.

Job Responsibilities
  • Must be respectful to Patients and their Attendants.
  • Must have Experience to use billing software.
  • Patients diagnosis Invoice, IPD and OPD bill should be prepared in software as per cost sheet and Hospital policy.
  • Daily, cash collection and reports should be submitted to accounts department.
  • Any incomplete work needs to handover to receiver time to time.
  • Providing information to patients regarding medical services, packages and other facilities.
  • Patients outstanding bills should be collected by talking to Patients or Patient’s attendants every day.
  • File of patients outstanding bills should be maintained properly.
  • Financial reports prepared as per Management Requirement.

Educational Requirements
  • Graduation or Masters in any discipline. Commerce background preferred.

Experience Requirements 
  • Must have minimum 3 years’ experience as billing executive in and Hospital.

Additional Job Requirements
  • Preferably in Hospital IPD/OPD Billing experience.
  • Excellent communication, negotiation and interpersonal skills with high level of emotional intelligence
  • Team player with leadership qualities
  • Advanced level computer skills particularly in MS Excel and Word.
  • Experienced in working in Software
  • Might require to complete tasks outside working hours to the extent necessary to carry out her/his duties.

Job Location
Uttar Badda, Dhaka

Salary
  • Negotiable
 

Email: career@amzhospitalbd.com

Company Information
AMZ Hospital Ltd. Address: 80/3, Shadinota Sarani (Pragati Sarani), North Badda, Dhaka-1212
